document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Kazakhstan , Siberia, Mongolia , North Africa ( Caldara 2013a ).

Material examined.
Crimea
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol Distr., Dzhalman, G. Kachowski leg.; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Alma, A. Bazhenov leg., 24.v.1899 ; 3 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol, Kiritschenko leg., 7.iv.1914 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Belbek, xi.1937 .
Donetsk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Tetyanivka, Svyatohirsk, Arnoldi leg., 29.v.1939 ; 4 spec. ( ZIN ) Yarova, Arnoldi leg., 25.v.1939 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Banne, Siverskyi Donets River, Svyatohirsk Monastery, Arnoldi leg., 2.vi.1937 ; 3 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 10.vi.1937 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 11.vi.1937 ;
Kharkiv Prov.
: 2 spec. ( ZIN ) Derhachi, 11.v.1916 ; 9 spec. ( ZIN ) KharkivDistr., DokuchaevaVill., night, on
Populus nigra
and
P. alba , N. Yunakov
leg., 28.v.2000 ;
Kherson Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kherson , Graftio leg., 19.v.1899 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Monast. Korsunskij, cursus in fl. Dnjepr. S.Medvedev, 24.v.1925 ; 2 spec. ( ZIN ) Black Sea Biosphere Reserve, V . Kostyukov leg., 19.v.1974 ; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. : 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Elisavetgrad [=Kropyvnytskyi], E. Jacentkowski leg., 24.iii.1905 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 20.vi.1905 ;
Kyiv Prov.
: 2 spec. ( ZIN ) Kyiv , A. Yakovlev leg.; 8 spec. ( ZIN ) Kyiv , TrukhanivIsland, on
Populus nigra , Matis
leg. 27.vii.1982 ;
Luhansk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Borova River, Lisichansk, Arnoldi leg., 19.vi.1937 ; 17 spec. ( ZIN ) Luhansk env., Talicky leg., 17.iv.1927 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 22.v.1927 ; 3 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 27.v.1927 ; 3 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 28.v.1927 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 10.vi.1927 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Luhansk env., A. Likhosherstov leg., 27.vi.1928 ; 6 spec. ( ZIN ) Stanitsa Luhanska , Luhansk env., Talicky leg., 27.v.1928 ; 5 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 12.vi.1928 ;
Poltava Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava , D. Ogloblin leg., 20.v.1909 ; 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Mirhorod Distr., Yareski, Fabri leg., 26.v.1925 ;
Volyn Prov.
: 5 spec. ( ZIN ) Markovichi, 12.v.1899 ; 12 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, 13.v.1899 ; 13 spec. ( ZIN ) idem, Olsufjev leg., 26.iv.1903 .

Biology. Floodplain forests. Adults occur in III–XI. On Salicaceae :
Populus nigra
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1972 ; Dieckmann 1986 ),
P. alba
,
P. deltoides ( Dieckmann 1986 )
.
